full_summary:
**De-icing Salt and Anti-slip Gravel Supply Contract**
=============================================

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**: WS4345011233-Doc4412768877

**Publication Date**: January 30, 2024

**Closing Date**: February 27, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Description**:
Transport Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of de-icing salt and anti-slip gravel, including delivery to Blanc-Sablon, Quebec. The contract involves the acquisition of de-icing salt and anti-slip gravel to meet the requirements specified in the Statement of Requirements annexed to this notice.

**Key Requirements**

* Supply of de-icing salt and anti-slip gravel
* Delivery to Blanc-Sablon, Quebec
* Compliant with the requirements specified in the Statement of Requirements

**Evaluation Criteria**: Bidders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Additional Information**

* This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc4345041585, dated December 19, 2023, with a closing date of January 15, 2024.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be offered to bidders who submitted offers on the previous solicitation upon request.

**Contact Information**

* Francois S. Martineau, Contract Officer
* Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Ariba Bid Link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18657268?extsite=MTg2NTcyNjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18657268?extsite=MTg2NTcyNjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Submission Guidelines**

* Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through Ariba Bid Link by the closing date (February 27, 2024, 2:00 PM EST).
* Late submissions will not be accepted.  I hope this meets your requirements. Let me know if I can help you with anything else!  I have reformatted the text to make it more readable and easy to understand. Remainder of details
